summary.title: Summary
summary.content: Swaptun is a playlist transfer service that helps you share music between streaming platforms. We only collect the minimum information necessary to provide our service: your email, username, and the playlist data you choose to transfer. We never store your passwords or sensitive information.

section3.title: 3. How We Share Your Information
section3.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We only share data when:
section3.item1: You explicitly authorize the transfer to a streaming platform
section3.item2: Required by law or to protect our legal rights
section3.item3: With service providers who help us operate (under strict confidentiality agreements)

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.intro: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:

access.title: Access Your Data
access.description: Request a copy of all personal information we hold about you

correct.description: Update or correct any inaccurate information

delete.title: Delete Your Data
delete.description: Request deletion of your account and all associated data

export.title: Export Your Data
export.description: Download your data in a portable format

section6.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
section6.item1: Keep you logged in to your account
section6.item3: Ensure the security of your session
section6.outro: You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings.

section7.title: 7. Data Retention
section7.content: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary to provide our services. When you delete your account, we remove all your personal data within 30 days, except where we're required by law to retain it longer (e.g., for tax or legal purposes).

section8.title: 8. Children's Privacy
section8.content: Swaptun is not intended for users under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

section9.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
section9.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We'll notify you of any material changes by email or through our app. Continued use of Swaptun after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
